roleset.name: troll
roleset.note: TROLL-V NOTES: Member of Vncls search-35.2. (from troll.01-v)

example.name: from Google
example.text: I keep hearing people say that they trolled the river using rattletraps and things like that.
example.arg: using rattletraps and things like that

example.name: all args
example.text: Manson trolled the streets for the homeless, runaways and neglected disenfranchised youth and made them his own "family"
example.arg: for the homeless, runaways and neglected disenfranchised youth
